title: Abourezk and Opinion of Counsel re: AOR by Kildee for Congress Committee
summary:
This entry consists of two documents, Part A and Part B.  Part A is an Advisory Opinion to Abourezk concerning the transfer of 

excess campaign funds into an office account.  Part B is an Opinion of Counsel issued to the Kildee for Congress Committee and 

not an opinion issued by the Commission, and does not constitute an Advisory Opinion.
